content.description: South Carolina passed a law to increase the state tax on gasoline to help fund repairs on highways and bridges. The state tax is in addition to the federal tax on every gallon of gasoline that is sold.
content.question: Which of the following constitutional provisions does this scenario illustrate?

topic.text: 1.7: Relationship Between the States and National Government

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Explain how political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors apply to different scenarios in context.
